ShortDesc: When making checks to handle or tame animals, add :wh: no greater than Force rating to the check. Spend :ldsp: to add :suc: or :adv: to the check.
LongDesc: When making checks to handle, tame, or control animals, the character may add a number of :wh: no greater than his Force rating to the check. The character may spend :ldsp: to add :suc: or :adv: (character's choice) to the result.

ShortDesc: Once per round. may suffer 3 strain to take the Armor Master incidental; reduce the next Critical lnjury suffered by 10 per Point of soak to a minimum of 1.
When making a check using the Lightsaber skill. The character may use Agility instead of Brawn.
LongDesc: When making a Lightsaber skill check, the character may use Agility instead of Brawn.

ShortDesc: May spend :adv: :adv: from a Deception or Coercion check to upgrade ability of a single ally's subsequent Social Interaction check against the target a number of times equal to ranks in Bad Cop.
When targeted by combat check From within medium range, may spend a Destiny Point to upgrade the difficulty of the check a number of times equal to ranks in Coercion.
This character and allies within short range add :adv: to combat checks while benefiti ng from cover.
As an action, make a Hard (:pu: :pu: :pu:) Resilience check to immediately recover from all poisons an side effects of drugs. Reduce difficulty once per rank of Blooded.
Once per session, when an ally protected by the Body Guard maneuver suffers a hit, suffer the hit instead.
LongDesc: Once per round on the character's turn, the character may perform a Body Guard maneuver to protect one ally with whom he is engaged. He then suffers a number of strain no greater than his ranks in Body Guard. Until the start of the character's next turn, upgrade the difficulty of all combat checks targeting the protected ally a number of times equal to the strain suffered by the character.

ShortDesc: When an opponent targets character with a Force povver. Reduce :ldsp: generated by 1.
LongDesc: When an opponent targets the character with a Force power. after the opponent generates O . reduce the total O generated by one, to a minimum of 0.

ShortDesc: Spend a maneuver and suffer 2 strain to extend Calming Aura's effects to allies equal to Willpovver at short range until start of next turn.
LongDesc: The character may spend a maneuver and suffer 2 strain to extend the effects of Calming Aura to a number of allies within short range equal to his Willpower. This lasts until the beginning of his next turn.

ShortDesc: Take a Center of Being maneuver. Until the beginning of next turn, attacks against the character increase their crilical rating by 1 per rank of Center of Being.
LongDesc: Once per round, when wielding a lightsaber, the character can make a Center of Being maneuver. Until the beginning of his next turn, whenever an enemy makes a melee attack targeting the character. the critical rating of the enemy's weapon counts as one higher per rank of Center of Being.

ShortDesc: Suffer 1 strain to perform Center of Being maneuver as an Incidental.
LongDesc: The character may voluntarily suffer 1 strain to perform Center of Being as an incidental instead of a maneuver.

ShortDesc: After rolling :wh:, may suffer wounds up to twice ranks in Channel Agony to add automatic :dsp: for every two wounds suffered to the results.
When an engaged ally surfers a hit. may use Parry or Reflect incidental against the hit.
LongDesc: When an ally engaged with the character suffers a hit from a combat check, the character may use a Parry or Reflect incidental to reduce the damage the hit deals (even though he is not the target of the combat check).

ShortDesc: Take Comprehend Technology action; make an Average (:pu: :pu:) Knowledge (Education) check to use Force rating as ranks in skills to use single item.
LongDesc:
Once per session. the character may take the Comprehend Technology action. making an Average (:pu: :pu:) Knowledge (Education) check to intuitively understand one weapon. armor set. or other piece of personal gear. Success means that for the remainder of the encounter, when the character makes any skill checks to use or repair the item, he may count his ranks in The applicable skill as equal to his current Force rating. 

For example, a character may use Comprel1end Technology to count his ranks in Mechanics as equal to his Force rating when repairing a broken lightsaber, or he can count his ranks in Ranged (Light) as equal to his Force rating when firing a blaster pistol.

ShortDesc: Remove :bk: per rank of Conditioned from Athlelics and Coordination checks.Reduce the damage and strain suffered from falling by 1 per rank of Conditioned.
LongDesc: The character removes :bk: per rank of Conditioned from his Athletics and Coordination checks. He reduces the damage and strain suffered from falling by 1 per rank of Coordination.

ShortDesc: May suffer a number of strain to downgrade difficulty of Charm or Negotiation checks or upgrade difficulty when targeted by Charm or Negotiation checks, by an equal number. Strain suffered this way cannot exceed ranks in Congenial.
Spend 1 Destiny Point to recover strain equal to Cunning rating.
LongDesc: The character may spend one Destiny Point to recover strain equal Lo his Cunning rating.

ShortDesc: When an attack misses the character and generates :des: or :thr: :thr:, may upgrade next Lightsaber (Cunning) check against attacker during encounter once.
LongDesc: Whenever an attack misses the character, the character may spend :thr: :thr: or :des: to upgrade the next Lightsaber (Cunning) combat check he makes against the attacker during his next turn once.

ShortDesc: Once per session, the character may introduce to negotiations one potential concession that an opponent will do nearly anything to obtain.

May take the Defensive Circle action. making a Hard(:pu: :pu: :pu:) Lightsaber (Intellect) check. The character, plus one ally within short range per :suc: gains X defense until the beginning of next turn. X equals 1 plus 1 per :adv: :adv:.
LongDesc: While wielding a lightsaber. the character may take the Defensive Circle action. making a Hard (:pu: :pu: :pu:) Lightsaber (Intellect) check. If successful. the character plus one ally per :suc: within short range gains ranged and melee defense X until the beginning of the character's next turn. X equals 1, plus 1 for every :adv: :adv:.

ShortDesc: When wielding a Lightsaber, Melee, or Brawl weapon. the weapon gains the Defensive quality with a rating equal to ranks in Defensive Training.
LongDesc: When the character wields a Lightsaber weapon, Melee weapon, or Brawl weapon, that weapon gains ranks in the Defensive item quality equal to the character's ranks in Defensive Training (this replaces any ranks in Defensive the weapon already has).

ShortDesc: Perform Disruptive Strike action; make a Lightsaber (Cunning) combat check, adding :wh: no greater than Force rating. Spend :ldsp: to add :fai: to the next combat check the target makes.
LongDesc: The character may take a Disruptive Strike action. making a Lightsaber (Cunning) combat check against one engaged target and adding :wh: no greater than Force rating to the check. The character may spend :ldsp: to add :fai: to the target's next combat check made during this encounter.

ShortDesc: After using Reflect, may spend 1 Destiny Point to perform Move maneuver as out-of-turn incidental to close distance with or engage opponent.
LongDesc: After using the Reflect incidental. The character may spend one Destiny Point to perform a Move maneuver as an out of turn incidental to move closer to or engage an opponent. This incidental may be performed once per round.

ShortDesc: Perform Draw Closer action: make a Lightsaber (Willpower) combat check against one silhouette 1 target within medium range, adding :wh: no greater than Force rating to check. Spend :ldsp: to move target one range band closer or to add :suc: to check.
LongDesc: The character may take a Draw Closer action. making a Lightsaber (Willpower) melee combat check against one silhouette 1 (or smaller) target within medium range and adding a number of :wh: no greater than Force rating to the check. The character may spend :ldsp: before resolving the success or failure of the check to move the target one range band closer to the character (including from short to engaged). He may also spend :ldsp: to add :suc: to the combat check. If the character cannot move his target to engage him. the combat check automatically misses.

ShortDesc: Add :bl: to Melee and Lightsaber checks when engaged with only one opponent.
LongDesc: The character adds :bl: to his Melee and Lightsaber checks when engaged with only a single opponent. A single minion group counts as multiple opponents.

ShortDesc: If the character is carrying items that total 2 encumbrance or less, add :lsp: :dsp: to Force power checks.
When making a Leadership check. add :wh: no greater than Force rating. Spend :ldsp: to add :suc: or :adv: to the resuIt.
LongDesc: When making a Leadership check, the character may add :wh: no greater than Force rating to the check. The character may spend :ldsp: to add :suc: or :adv: (character's choice) to the result.

ShortDesc: Suffer 2 strain to add damage equal to Brawn to next Lightsaber combat check made this turn.
LongDesc: Once per round the character may suffer 2 strain to add additional damage equal to Brawn to one hit of a successful Lightsaber combat check.

ShortDesc: When an adversary becomes engaged with the character, the character may force the adversary to make a fear check, with the difficulty equal to the character's ranks in Fearsome.
LongDesc: When an adversary becomes engaged with the character, the character may force the adversary to make a fear check (see page 326), with the difficulty equal to the character's ranks in Fearsome. At the GM's discretion, some adversaries may be immune to this talent based on the type of adversary or the ongoing circumstances.

ShortDesc: Spend :tri: or :adv: :adv: :adv: generated on a missed melee attack to upgrade difficulty of opponent's next altack targeting character by ranks in Feint.
LongDesc: Upon missing an opponent with a Lightsaber, Brawl, or Melee combat check. the character may spend :tri: or :adv: :adv: :adv: to upgrade the difficulty of the opponent's next combat check targeting the character during this encounter by the character's ranks in Feint.

ShortDesc: Once per session, may take the Font of Power action. Until the end of the encounter, characters within medium range add automatic :lsp: or :dsp: to checks based on alignment.
Spend :tri: or :adv: :adv: :adv: on a missed Lightsaber (Willpower) combat check to immediately perform Move Force power action as maneuver.
LongDesc:
Upon missing an opponent with a Lightsaber (Willpower) combat check, the character may spend :tri: or :adv: :adv: :adv: to perform a Move Force power action as a maneuver this turn (the character must still be able to perform maneuvers and still may not perform more than two maneuvers in a turn). 

The character must have already purchased the Move Force power to use it as part of this ability.

ShortDesc: Perform the Force Protection maneuver: suffer 1 strain and commit :wh: up to ranks of Force Protection. Increase soak by number of :wh: committed until beginning of next turn. Suffer 1 strain every turn :wh: remains committed.
LongDesc: The character may take the Force Protection maneuver, suffering 1 strain and committing a number of :wh: no greater than Force rating or ranks of Force Protection. The character then increases his soak value by an equal amount. The character suffers 1 strain at the beginning of each of his turns in which he keeps these dice committed.

ShortDesc: Perform the Forewarning action. All allies within medium range increase defense by character's Force rating until they act in the encounter.
LongDesc: The character may take the Forewarning action. All allies within medium range increase their melee and ranged defense by a number equal to the character's Force rating until they take their first turn during an encounter. If they have already taken their first turn, Forewarning has no effect.

ShortDesc: Once per session, the character counts as having the tools for the job when making a skill check.

Take the Hawk Bat Swoop action. Perform a Lightsaber (Agility) combat check against target within short range. adding :wh: no greater than Force rating. Spend :ldsp: to engage target and spend :ldsp: to add :adv: to check.
LongDesc: The character may take a Hawk Bat Swoop action, performing a Lightsaber (Agility) melee combat check against one target within short range and adding :wh: no greater than Force rating to the pool. The character may spend :ldsp: before resolving the success or failure of the check to engage the target immediately as an incidental, and may spend :ldsp: to add :adv: to the check. If the character cannot move to engage the target, the attack automatically misses.

ShortDesc: Commit :wh:. For every full encounLer :wh: remains committed. Heal 1 wound per rank or Healing Trance.
LongDesc: The character may commit :wh:. For every full encounter :wh: remains committed, the character heals 1 wound he is suffering per rank of Healing Trance. This is in addition to wounds healed due to natural rest or other abilities. If in a situation without defined encounters, the GM can have Healing Trance take effect every 12 hours.

ShortDesc: When healing wounds due to Healing Trance, make a Resilience check to heal a Critical Injury. Difficulty of the check equals severity of the Critical Injury.
LongDesc: Whenever the character heals wounds as a result of Healing Trance, if the character is suffering from a Critical Injury, he makes a Resilience check with the difficulty equal to the Critical Injury's severity rating. On a successful check, the character recovers from the Critical Injury. If the character is suffering from multiple Critical Injuries, he chooses which one to attempt to recover from.

ShortDesc: After being exposed to a substance, as an out of turn incidental, may roll :wh: no greater than Force rating. Spend :ldsp: :ldsp: to immediately identify its composition and effects.

Take the Imbue Item maneuver; suffer 1 strain and commit :wh: to grant one weapon, piece of armor, or item an improvement while :wh: remains committed. Suffer 1 strain every round :wh: remains committed.
LongDesc: The character may take the Imbue Item maneuver, suffering 1 strain and committing :wh:. He then grants one weapon or item within short range a temporary enhancement chosen from the following options: increase weapon's damage by 1, decrease the :adv: cost for its Critical Hit or for any other single effect by 1, to a minimum of 1, or increase a piece of armor's ranged or melee defense by 1 . Alternatively, the character can decrease an item's encumbrance by 2 to a minimum of 1. The character suffers 1 strain at the beginning of each of his turns in which he keeps this die committed.

ShortDesc: Once per session, as an action, make a Hard (:pu: :pu: :pu:) Knowledge (Xenology) check, adding :wh: no greater than Force rating to create 1 dose of a poison or drug with rarity of Intellect + :suc: + :ldsp: spent or lower.

Perform the Intuitive Evasion maneuver; suffer 1 strain and commit :wh: up to ranks of Intuitive Evasion. Upgrade difficulty of combat checks targeting starship or vehicle by equal amount. Suffer 1 strain every round :wh: remains committed.
LongDesc: When piloting a vehicle of silhouette 5 or smaller, the character may take the Intuitive Evasion maneuver, suffering l strain and committing a number of :wh: no greater than his Force rating or his ranks of Intuitive Evasion. He then upgrades the difficulty of combat checks targeting his vehicle by an equal amount. The character suffers 1 strain at the beginning of each of his turns in which these dice remain committed.

ShortDesc: When making check to craft or repair item, may add :wh: no greater than Force rating to check. Spend :ldsp: :ldsp: to increase hard points by 1, to max of +2.
LongDesc: When making a check to repair or craft a non-starship or vehicle item, the character may add :wh: no greater than Force rating to the check. The character may spend :ldsp: :ldsp: to permanently increase the number of hard points the item has by 1. to a maximum of 2 additional hard points. An item may only be improved in this way once.

ShortDesc: When making a Ranged (Heavy) or Ranged (Light) combat check, add :wh: no greater than Force rating to check. May spend :ldsp: to add :suc: or :adv:.
LongDesc: When making a Ranged (Heavy) or Ranged (Light) combat check, the character may add :wh: no greater than Force rating to the check. The character may spend :ldsp: to add :suc: or :adv: (character's choice) to the result.

ShortDesc: When making a combat check with a planetary scale weapon, add :wh: no greater than Force rating to the check. Spend :ldsp: :ldsp: to add :suc: or :adv:.
LongDesc: When making a combat check with a vehicle weapon, the character may add :wh: no greater than Force rating to the check. The character may spend :ldsp: :ldsp: to add :suc: or :adv: (character's choice) to the result.

ShortDesc: When carrying items that total 2 encumbrance or less, at the end of each encounter, heal all strain the character is suffering.
Remove :bk: per rank of Keen Eyed from Perception and Vigilance checks. Decrease time to search a specific area by half.
LongDesc: The character removes :bk: per rank of Keen Eyed from his Perception and Vigilance checks. Checks made to search a specific area take 50% less time than normal. This does not decrease with additional ranks of Keen Eyed.

ShortDesc: Once per session. When making a check, count Force rating as being equal to ranks in Knowledge (Lore).
LongDesc: Once per session, when making a single check, the character may treat his Force rating as being equal to his ranks in Knowledge (Lore).

ShortDesc: When healing an ally, spend 1 Destiny Point t o heal additional wounds equal to ranks in Knovvledge (Xenology).
LongDesc: When the character performs a successful Medicine check to heal an ally, the character may spend one Destiny Point to allow The target to heal additional wounds equal to the character's ranks in Knowledge (Xenology).

ShortDesc: Take the Makashi Finish action. Perform a Lightsaber (Presence) combat check against engaged target. adding :wh: no greater than Force rating. Spend :ldsp: to add +10 to any resulting Critical Injury rolls.
LongDesc: The character may take the Makashi Finish action, making a Lightsaber (Presence) combat check against an engaged target, adding :wh: no greater than Force rating to the check. The character may spend :ldsp: to add +10 to any Critical Injury roll resulting from the check.

ShortDesc: Once per encounter. Perrorm Makashi Flourish action. Make an Average (:pu: :pu:) Lightsaber (Presence) check. 1 engaged opponent suffers strain equal to :suc:, and heal an equal amount of strain.
LongDesc: Once per encounter, the character may take the Makashi Flourish action, making an Average (:pu: :pu:) Lightsaber (Presence) check. If it is successful, one engaged opponent suffers strain equal to :suc: (ignoring soak). and the character recovers an equal amount of strain. The character may also spend :adv: :adv:, or :tri: generated on the check to stagger the opponent until the end of the target's next turn.

ShortDesc: When making a check using the Lightsaber skill. The character may use Presence instead of Brawn.
LongDesc: When making a check using the Lightsaber skill, the character may use Presence instead of Brawn.

ShortDesc: Once per round, may take the Master Artisan incidental; suffer 2 strain to decrease the difficulty of next Mechanics check by 1, to a minimum of Easy (:pu:).
LongDesc: Once per round. the character may voluntarily suffer 2 strain to decrease the difficulty of his next Mechanics check (or his next check to build or mod an item) by one, to a minimum of Easy (:pu:).

ShortDesc: Once per round as an out of turn incidental, may suffer 2 strain to allow ally to use character’s ranks in Discipline for next Discipline check an ally makes.
When Suffocating, the character suffers 1 strain each round instead of 3, When exposed to vacuum, the character suffers 1 wound each round instead of 3.
May perform the Mental Bond action. Commit :wh:. While committed, may communicate with bonded animal at long range and see and hear through its senses.
LongDesc: The character may take the Mental Bond action, committing :wh:. As long as :wh: remains committed, he may communicate mentally with an animal bonded to him via the Animal Bond talent. He can see and hear what it sees and hears, and in structured encounters, he may direct his animal (see the Animal Bond talent, page 1 38) at up to extreme range.

ShortDesc: Always count as havng the right tools for the job when performing Mechanics checks .
LongDesc: The character always counts as having the right tools for the job (see page 181) when performing Mechanics checks.

ShortDesc: When attacked, the character may choose to suffer strain no greater than the number of wounds suffered from the attack. If he does so, the attacker then suffers a number of wounds equal to the strain suffered by the character.
Add :bl: to Lightsaber, Brawl and Melee checks when engaged with multiple opponents.
LongDesc: The character adds :bl: to his Brawl, Melee, and Lightsaber combat checks when engaged with multiple opponents. This includes single groups of multiple minions.

ShortDesc: Once per session, may reroll any 1 Lightsaber or Melee check.
LongDesc: Once per game session, the character may reroll any one Lightsaber or Melee check.

ShortDesc: Once per session, may reroll any 1 Force power check.
LongDesc: Once per session, the character may reroll any one Force power check.

ShortDesc: When making a Lightsaber skill check, the character may use Willpower instead of Bravvn.
LongDesc: When making a Lightsaber skill check, the character may use Willpower instead of Brawn.

ShortDesc: May spend :adv: :adv: from a Coercion check or :thr: :thr: from a foe's Discipline check: that target cannot perform a free maneuver during his next turn.
Once per session, choose one talent of Force power that any character in the current encounter possesses. Gain that talent or Force power until the end of the encounter.
Once per session, take Now You See Me action. Make a Hard (:pu: :pu: :pu:) Deception check to make a number of NPCs equal to Cunning within medium range forget about character.
LongDesc:
Once per session, the character may take the Now You See Me action, making a Hard(:pu: :pu: :pu:) Deception check. If successful, a number of NPCs equal to his Cunning within medium range forget any interactions they had with the character during the last thirty minutes.

At the GM's discretion, multiple :thr: or :des: may give the NPCs in question unpleasant side effects, such as confusion, nightmares, or a persistent and maddening suspicion that they've forgotten something important.

ShortDesc: As an action, suffer 4 strain and let one ally within short range increase the ally’s Force rating by an amount equal to the character’s Force rating until the end of the round.

Once per session, meditate, then perform One with the Universe action: make Average (:pu: :pu:) Astrogation check. If successful, add :lsp: to all Force power checks in next encounter. If successful with :thr: add :dsp: instead.
LongDesc: Once per session, the character may spend several minutes meditating, then take the One with the Universe action, making an Average (:pu: :pu:) Astrogation check. If successful, during the next encounter he adds :lsp: to all Force power checks. However, if he succeeded with :thr:, he adds :dsp: to all Force power checks instead.

ShortDesc: Commit :wh:. Add :adv: to social checks equal to committed. Add :thr: equal to :wh: committed to enemy social checks in short range.
Characters affected by Overwhelming Aura add automatic :fai: to fear checks the character cases and automatic :suc: to fear check not caused by the character
When hit by a melee attack, suffer 3 strain to reduce damage by 2 plus ranks in Parry.
LongDesc: When the character suffers a hit from a Brawl, Melee, or Lightsaber combat check, after damage is calculated (but before soak is applied, so immediately after step 3 of Perform a Combat Check, page 210), the character may take a Parry incidental. He suffers 3 strain and reduces the damage dealt by that hit by a number equal to 2 plus his ranks in Parry. This talent may only be used once per hit and when the character is wielding a Lightsaber or Melee weapon.

ShortDesc: When parrying a hit that generated :des: or :thr: :thr: :thr:, may hit attacker once with Lightsaber, Brawl, or Melee weapon (dealing base damage) after original attack resolves.
LongDesc: When the character suffers a hit from a Brawl, Melee, or Lightsaber combat check and uses the Parry incidental to reduce the damage from that hit, after the attack is resolved, the character may spend :des: or :thr: :thr: :thr: to automatically hit the attacker once with a wielded Brawl, Melee, or Lightsaber weapon. This hit deals the weapon's base damage plus any damage from applicable talents or abilities. This talent may not be used if the original attack incapacitates the character.

ShortDesc: If the user did not make a combat check during his previous turn, may suffer 1 strain to use Parry.
LongDesc: If the user did not make a combat check during his previous turn, he suffers 1 strain when taking the Parry incidental, instead of 3.

ShortDesc: When making a Medicine check to help a character heal wounds, the target heals 1 additional strain per rank of Physician.
LongDesc: When this character makes a Medicine check to help a character heal wounds. the target heals one additional strain per rank of Physician.

ShortDesc: Once per session, may perform the Power of Darkness maneuver. Increase wound threshold and strain threshold by 1 per Dark Side destiny point currently in the Destiny pool until the end of the encounter.
May spend 1 Destiny Point to disengage from engaged enemy as an out-of-turn incidental.
LongDesc: Immediately after an opponent moves to engage the character, the character may spend one Destiny Point to disengage from that opponent as an out-of-turn incidental.

ShortDesc: Add :bl: to all Ranged (Light) checks unless the target is immune to Force powers.
Add +1 damage to one hit of successful combat checks against disoriented targets per rank of Prey on the Weak.
LongDesc: The character deals + 1 damage to one hit on all successful combat checks against disoriented targets per rank of Prey on the Weak.

ShortDesc: When this character or an ally in short range takes cover, he increases soak against ranged attacks by 1 per rank of Prime Positions until he leaves that cover.
While benefiting from an Aim maneuver. :des: from this character's Ranged (Heavy) and Ranged (Light) checks cannot cause attacks to hit allies engaged with the target.
Suffer 2 strain to perform the Quick Movement incidental; add :wh: no greater than Force rating to next check. May spend :ldsp: :ldsp: to perform one additional Move maneuver after action.
LongDesc: Before making a non-Force power check during structured gameplay, the character may suffer 2 strain to add :wh: no greater than Force rating to the check. The character may spend :ldsp: :ldsp: generated during the check to perform one free Move maneuver after the check is finished. This Move maneuver may be in addition to any other maneuvers performed this turn and can allow the character to perform three maneuvers in a turn.

ShortDesc: When hit by a ranged attack, suffer 3 strain to reduce damage by 2 plus ranks in Reflect.
LongDesc: When the character suffers a hit from a Ranged (Light), Ranged (Heavy). or Gunnery combat check, and after damage is calculated (but before soak is applied, so immediately after step 3 of Perform a Combat Check, page 210), he may take the Reflect incidental. He suffers 3 strain and reduces the damage dealt by that hit by a number equal to 2 plus his ranks in Reflect. This talent may only be used once per hit and when the character is wielding a Lightsaber weapon.

ShortDesc: When reflecting a hit that generated :des: or :thr: :thr: :thr:, may hit one target in medium range with the same damage as the initial hit, after original attack resolves.
LongDesc:
When the character suffers a hit from a Ranged (Light), Ranged (Heavy), or Gunnery combat check and uses the Reflect incidental to reduce the damage from that hit, after the attack is resolved, the character may spend :des: or :thr: :thr: :thr: to automatically hit one target within medium range, dealing the same damage as the hit from the initial ranged attack. 

The ranged attack's hit must be one that is able to be reflected and redirected (generally only blaster weapons or other energy attacks fall into this category; anything else is subject to GM oversight). This talent may not be used if the original attack incapacitates the character.

ShortDesc: If the user did not make a combat check during previous turn, may suffer 1 strain to use Reflect.
LongDesc: If the character did not make a combat check during his previous turn, he suffers 1 strain when taking the Reflect incidental, instead of 3.

ShortDesc: Take the Reinforce Item maneuver: commit :wh: :wh: to grant one weapon or piece of armor the Cortosis quality while :wh: :wh: remains commilted. Suffer 3 strain every round :wh: :wh: remains committed.
Suffer 2 strain to avoid being disarmed or have weapon damaged or destroyed.
LongDesc: If the character would be disarmed or his weapon would be damaged or destroyed, he may choose to suffer 2 strain to ignore the effect.

ShortDesc: Perform the Saber swarm maneuver; suffer I strain to make next Lightsaber (Agility) combat check this turn gain the Linked item quality equal to Force rating during check.
LongDesc: The character may take the Saber Swarm maneuver, suffering 1 strain. His next Lightsaber (Agility) combat check this turn gains the Linked item quality, with ranks equal to Force rating.

ShortDesc: Perform Saber Throw action, make Lightsaber combat check as ranged attack at target within medium range, adding :wh: no greater than Force rating. Must spcnd :ldsp: and succeed to hit target; spend :ldsp: to have weapon return to hand.
LongDesc: The character may take the Saber Throw action, making a Lightsaber combat check as a ranged attack at one target within medium range, adding :wh: no greater than his Force rating to the check. The character must spend :ldsp: and succeed on the check to hit his target; he may spend :ldsp: to have his weapon return to his hand after resolving the attack.

ShortDesc: Increase difficulty of Lightsaber check by 1 to perform Sarlacc Sweep action. May spend :adv: :adv: to hit additional engaged targets.
LongDesc:
